DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immunogenicity different combination A/H1N1 S-OIV ( swine flu ) vaccine non-elderly elderly adult .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity A/H1N1-SOIV ( Swine Flu ) Vaccine With Without Adjuvant Non-Elderly Elderly Adults
DOC.criteria: Adults 18 year age old good health determine medical history , physical assessment clinical judgement investigator without influenza within past 6 month . History serious disease . History serious reaction follow administration vaccine hypersensitivity vaccine component . Known suspect impairment/alteration immune function . Receipt plan receipt seasonal trivalent influenza vaccine within 1 week study vaccination . Sexually active woman childbearing potential must use acceptable birth control treatment phase study . For additional entry criterion , please refer protocol .
